Keywords: Femizons , Frightful Four , Future , Lady Liberators , Warrior
Real Name: Thundra
Special Powers
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: INDIVIDUAL COMBAT: UNIQUE MODIFIER: During opponents' turns friendly characters with the Frightful Four keyword modify defense +1 for each attack that is resolved that turn (Doesn't affect first attack).
COMBAT CHAIN: Giant Reach: 2. When Thundra makes a close attack, after resolutions you may place a hit character in an adjacent square (Adjacent to her).
